title: IV General Exclusions
sample_text:
This Policy does not provide benefits for any Death, 
Disability, expenses or loss incurred as a result of any 
Injury attributable directly or indirectly to the following: 
1.
Any existing disability prior to the inception of the
first policy with us.
2.
Compensation under more than one of the Covers
under 1, 2 or 3 of Table of Benefit in respect of the
same accident and/or same period of disablement
during a single Policy period.
3.
Any other payment, after a claim under one of the
Covers under 1, 2 or 3 of Table of Benefits has
been admitted and become payable other than for
payments under
